Class ArchiveStoryInfo

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.core.ArchiveStoryInfo
public class ArchiveStoryInfo extends Object

This class is a data model for AO3 story metadata. ArchiveIngestor uses this to store relevant story metadata.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<String>
    additionalTags
    This attribute stores the additional tags assigned to the story.

      This attribute stores the unique SHA-256 generated by the story's information.

      This attribute stores whether the story metadata has already been defined.

      This attribute stores the title of the story.

      public ArrayList<String> authors

      This attribute stores the authors of the story.

      public ArrayList<String> summary

      This attribute stores the summary of the story.

      public ArrayList<String> associations

      This attribute stores the associations of the story.

    • startNotes

      public ArrayList<String> startNotes

      This attribute stores the starting notes of the story.

    • endNotes

      public ArrayList<String> endNotes

      This attribute stores the ending notes of the story.

    • registeredKudos

      public ArrayList<String> registeredKudos

      This attribute stores a list of registered users who have left kudos.

    • unregisteredKudos

      public Integer unregisteredKudos

      This attribute stores how much unregistered kudos are left. Unregistered kudos can count as guest kudos are simply users who are not counted during the parsing process.

    • publicBookmarks

      public ArrayList<String> publicBookmarks

      This attribute stores a list of registered users who publicly bookmarked the story.

    • unregisteredBookmarks

      public Integer unregisteredBookmarks

      This attribute stores how much unregistered bookmarks are left. Unregistered kudos can count as private bookmarks or bookmarks that are simply not counted during the parsing process.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveStoryInfo

      public ArchiveStoryInfo(ArrayList<String> ratings, ArrayList<String> warnings, ArrayList<String> categories, ArrayList<String> fandoms, ArrayList<String> relationships, ArrayList<String> characters, ArrayList<String> additionalTags, String language, ArrayList<String> series, ArrayList<String> collections, String published, String status, String statusWhen, String words, String chapters, String comments, String kudos, String bookmarks, String hits)

      This constructor is used to instantiate a story metadata object with initial information.

      Parameters:
      ratings - The ratings list parsed from the story link.
      warnings - The warnings list parsed from the story link.
      categories - The categories list parsed from the story link.
      fandoms - The fandoms list parsed from the story link.
      relationships - The relationships list parsed from the story link.
      characters - The characters list parsed from the story link.
      additionalTags - The additional tags list parsed from the story link.
      language - The language parsed from the story link.
      series - The series list parsed from the story link.
      collections - The collections list parsed from the story link.
      published - The publishing date parsed from the story link.
      status - The status parsed from the story link.
      statusWhen - The status update date parsed from the story link.
      words - The word count parsed from the story link.
      chapters - The chapter count parsed from the story link.
      comments - The comment count parsed from the story link.
      kudos - The kudos count parsed from the story link.
      bookmarks - The bookmark count parsed from the story link.
      hits - The hit count parsed from the story link.

  • Method Details

    • parseInitString

      public static Integer parseInitString(String initString)

      This method parses a string into an integer using class-specific rules.

      Parameters:
      initString - The number in string format.
      Returns:
      The number as an integer.

    • setPrefaceInfo

      public void setPrefaceInfo(String title, ArrayList<String> authors, ArrayList<String> summary, ArrayList<String> associations, ArrayList<String> startNotes, ArrayList<String> endNotes)

      This method sets the preface-specific attributes of the story metadata object.

      Parameters:
      title - The parsed title of the story.
      authors - The parsed authors of the story.
      summary - The parsed summary of the story.
      associations - The parsed associations of the story.
      startNotes - The parsed starting notes of the story.
      endNotes - The parsed ending notes of the story.

    • setKudosList

      public void setKudosList(ArrayList<String> kudosList)

      This method sets theregisteredKudos and unregisteredKudos attributes of the story metadata object.

      Parameters:
      kudosList - The parsed list of users who left kudos.

    • setPublicBookmarkList

      public void setPublicBookmarkList(ArrayList<String> bookmarkList)

      This method sets thepublicBookmarks and unregisteredBookmarks attributes of the story metadata object.

      Parameters:
      bookmarkList - The parsed list of users who left public bookmarks.

    • getJSONRep

      public org.json.JSONObject getJSONRep()

      This method retrieves a JSONObject representation of the story metadata.

      Returns:
      JSONObject representation of the story metadata.
